pr_title: feat: Serve theme static files from VAADIN/static

timeline.message:
feat: Serve theme static files from VAADIN/static

Static files in META-INF/VAADIN/static will now be served
on request to VAADIN/static.
Added new webpack loader that changes app theme
css urls targeting ./ to be VAADIN/static/ instead.

Fixes #9405
update: theme-loader only updates url if file exists by path.

timeline.bodyText: We could verify that a file that is not intended to be copied is not actually copied (and served), maybe like .css or theme.json
timeline.author: pleku

replies.bodyText: This can only be done in the IT test as here we don't copy anything and anything in VAADIN/static should be shared.
replies.author: caalador

timeline.message:
Handle CSS imports with theme-loader

correctly update urls with path navigation.
